name: 張致遠
objective:
本課程講解衛星的電機系統，包括指令與資料處理、電力、通訊、飛行軟體及電機介面等，並以國內衛星的實例說明發展程序。建議先修電子學或電子電路相關課程。
This course introduces the satellite electrical systems, including instructions and data processing, power, communications, flight software, and electrical interfaces. This course also uses the example of domestic satellite systems to illustrate the development procedures. It is recommended that students have taken courses related to Electronics or Electronic Circuits.
